title: FS: 1906 Buffalo Bisons Team postcard w/ George Stallings "SOLD"
author: jb217676

posts.post_title: FS: 1906 Buffalo Bisons Team postcard w/ George Stallings "SOLD"
posts.post_content: Available for sale is a 1906 Buffalo Bisons Team postcard that includes George Stallings. Postcard is postally used and exhibits some creasing but who cares, you'll never see another! "SOLD"
Thanks to a fellow collector for letting me know this postcard contains the only known cardboard appearance of former Brooklyn Dodger Frank McManus.
Frank McManus was found murdered in his bed in Syracuse, NY in 1923.
